question.string: Are there other solar systems?

query.sparql: ask where { ?proj text:"other" . ?proj text:"solar systems" . }

question.string: Did George Washington want to be a teacher?

query.sparql: PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> ask where { res:George_Washington text:"want" . res:George_Washington text:"be" . res:George_Washington text:"teacher" . }

question.string: Does Johns Hopkins Bayview Medical Center have a burn victim unit?

query.sparql: PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> ask where { res:Johns_Hopkins_Bayview_Medical_Center text:"burn victim unit" . }

question.string: Give me all greek gods.

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type owl:Thing . ?uri text:"greek god" . }

question.string: Give me the names of all of the people who signed the American Declaration of Independence.

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:person . ?uri text:"signed" . { ?uri text:"American Declaration of Independence" . } UNION { ?uri text:"Declaration of Independence" . }  }

question.string: The name of which ocean refers to Atlas of Greek mythology?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX dbc: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Category:> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type owl:Thing . ?uri dct:subject dbc:Oceans . ?uri text:"refers" . ?uri text:"Atlas" . ?uri text:"Greek mythology" . }

question.string: Which star is about 4.24 light-years from the Sun.

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Star . ?uri text:"star" . ?uri text:"4.24 light-years" . ?uri text:"Sun" . }

question.string: Which transmission does the German car with a top speed of 407 km/h have?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?trans WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Automobile . ?uri dbo:transmission ?trans . ?uri text:"German" . ?uri text:"top speed" . ?uri text:"407 km/h" . }

question.string: Which star's diameter is about 109 times that of Earth?

query.sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri text:"star" . ?uri text:"diameter" . ?uri text:"109 times" . ?uri text:"Earth" . }

question.string: Which writer was involved in two successive plane crashes?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Writer . ?uri text:"two successive plane crashes" . }

question.string: How many children did the person have that began their concerts with 'Hello, I'm Johnny Cash'?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT (COUNT(?child) AS ?count) WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Person . ?uri dbo:child ?child . ?uri text:"began" . ?uri text:"concerts" . ?uri text:"Hello" . ?uri text:"I'm Johnny Cash" . }

question.string: What is the team size of the sport that is practiced by 250 million players in over 200 nations?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> select distinct ?size where { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Sport . ?uri dbo:teamSize ?size .?uri text:"250 million" . ?uri text:"players, " . ?uri text:"200" . ?uri text:"nations" . }

question.string: Were there more than 1000 different species of non-avian dinosaurs?

query.sparql: ask where { ?proj text:"more" . ?proj text:"1000 different species" . ?proj text:"non-avian" . ?proj text:"dinosaur" . }

question.string: Which indigenous language includes a large proportion of non-indigenous people?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Language . ?uri text:"includes a large proportion of non-indigenous people" . }

question.string: Which animal is primarily responsible for the extinction of 33 species of birds?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Animal . ?uri text:"responsible" . ?uri text:"extinction" . ?uri text:"33 species" . ?uri text:"birds" . }

question.string: Was the Earth formed about 4.54 billion years ago?

query.sparql: PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> ask where { res:Earth text:"formed" . res:Earth text:"4.54 billion" . res:Earth text:"years" . }

question.string: Which television series is about the survivors of a passenger jet crash on a tropical island?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:TelevisionShow . ?uri text:"survivors" . ?uri text:"passenger jet" . ?uri text:"crash" . ?uri text:"tropical island" . }

question.string: In what present-day country did the Protestant Reformation begin?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Country . ?uri text:"Protestant Reformation" . ?uri text:"begin" . }

question.string: Is Michael Jordan the MVP of all time?

query.sparql: ask where { ?proj text:"Michael Jordan" . ?proj text:"MVP of all time" . }

question.string: Which company is a portmanteau of the words microcomputer and software?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Company . ?uri text:"portmanteau" . ?uri text:"words" . ?uri text:"microcomputer" . ?uri text:"software" . }

question.string: What causes earthquakes?

query.sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri text:"causes earthquakes" . }

question.string: Who was the first European to reach India by sea?

query.sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri text:"first European" . ?uri text:"reach India" . ?uri text:"by sea" . }

question.string: For which video game was an Apple II version planned but never released.

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:VideoGame . ?uri text:"Apple II version" . ?uri text:"planned" . ?uri text:"never released" .  }

question.string: Is an eggshell made of Calcium carbonate?

query.sparql: PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> ask where { { res:Eggshell text:"made of" . } UNION { res:Eggshell text:"contain" . }  res:Eggshell text:"Calcium carbonate" . }

question.string: What is California's state bird?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Bird . ?uri text:"California" . ?uri text:"state bird" . }

question.string: What is the worldwide best-selling album of all time?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Album . ?uri text:"best-selling album of all time" . ?uri text:"worldwide" . }

question.string: What is the alias of the band which member was ranked the 17th greatest guitarist of all time by a Guitar World magazine reader's poll in 2012?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?alias WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Band . ?uri dbo:alias ?alias . ?uri dbo:bandMember ?member . ?member text:"17th greatest guitarist of all time" . ?member text:"Guitar World magazine" . ?member text:"reader's poll" . ?member text:"2012" . }

question.string: What is the best-selling book of all time?

query.sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri text:"best-selling book of all time" . }

question.string: What is the maximum depth of the lake with the alleged sighted monster Nessie?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?depth WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Lake . ?uri dbo:maximumDepth ?depth . ?uri text:"allege" . ?uri text:"sight" . ?uri text:"monster" . ?uri text:"Nessie" . }

question.string: How many bits does the CPU of the device have that IGN named the 9th greatest video game console of all time?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> SELECT DISTINCT ?bits WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Device . ?uri dbp:cpu ?bits . ?uri text:"IGN" . ?uri text:"name" . ?uri text:"9th greatest video game console of all time" . }

question.string: What is created by tanning animal rawhide?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type owl:Thing . ?uri text:"tanning" . ?uri text:"animal" .  ?uri text:"rawhide" .  }

question.string: What is the capital of the state whose flag reflects Hispanic and Native American influences?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?capital WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Place . ?uri dbo:capital ?capital . ?uri text:"flag" . ?uri text:"Hispanic" . ?uri text:"Native American" . ?uri text:"influence" . }

question.string: What causes the sound of thunder?

query.sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri text:"causes" . ?uri text:"sound" . ?uri text:"thunder" . }

question.string: Which animal is the largest flying land bird in the western hemisphere?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Animal . ?uri text:"largest" . ?uri text:"flying" . ?uri text:"land bird" . ?uri text:"Western Hemisphere" .  }

question.string: What is the total population of the town that port wine is named after?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Location. ?uri dbo:populationTotal ?proj . ?uri text:"port wine" . ?uri text:"named" . }

question.string: Give me the completion date of the ship sunken in the North Atlantic Ocean in 1912 and rediscovered in 1985.

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?date WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Ship. ?uri dbo:completionDate ?date . ?uri text:"sunken" . ?uri text:"North Atlantic Ocean" . ?uri text:"1912" . ?uri text:"rediscovered" . ?uri text:"1985" .  }

question.string: When did the person who worked on short satirical poems together with Goethe die?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?date WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Person . ?uri dbo:deathDate ?date . ?uri text:"work" . ?uri text:"short satirical poem" . ?uri text:"Goethe" . }

question.string: Which food's name derived from the verb 'empanar'?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Food . ?uri text:"name" . ?uri text:"derived" . ?uri text:"verb" . ?uri text:"empanar" . }

question.string: When was the leader of the first Antarctic expedition to reach the South Pole born?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?date WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Person . ?uri dbo:birthDate ?date . ?uri text:"leader" . ?uri text:"first" . ?uri text:"Antarctic expedition" . ?uri text:"reach" . ?uri text:"South Pole" . }

question.string: Which urban fire in the United States burned from October 8 to October 10, 1871?

query.sparql: PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX dbc: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Category:> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri dct:subject dbc:Urban_fires_in_the_United_States . ?uri text:"Sunday" . ?uri text:"October 8" . ?uri text:"Tuesday" . ?uri text:"October 10" . ?uri text:"1871" . }

question.string: What is the official name of the host city of the Summer Olympic Games in 1932 and 1984?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> SELECT DISTINCT ?name WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:City . ?uri dbp:officialName ?name . ?uri text:"host" . ?uri text:"Summer Olympic Games" . ?uri text:"1932" . ?uri text:"1984" . }

question.string: When was the band found whose performance in 1998 was documented by Wim Wenders?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?date WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Band . ?uri dbo:activeYearsStartYear ?date . ?uri text:"performance" . ?uri text:"1998" . ?uri text:"document" . ?uri text:"Wim Wenders" . }

question.string: Which battle in 1757 marked the beginning of the expansion of the British Empire in Asia?

query.sparql: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri dbo:date ?date . ?uri rdf:type dbo:MilitaryConflict . FILTER(year(?date)=1757) ?uri text:"begin" . ?uri text:"expand" . ?uri text:"British Empire" . ?uri text:"Asia" . }

question.string: Which Hindu deity is also known as 'Vinayaka'?

query.sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri text:"Hindu deity" . ?uri text:"known as" . ?uri text:"Vinayaka" . }

question.string: Which newspaper had an average daily circulation of 189000 copies in August 2013?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Newspaper . ?uri text:"average daily circulation" . ?uri text:"189000 copies" . ?uri text:"August 2013" . }

question.string: Which tiger reserve in India shares the north-eastern boundary with Nepal?

query.sparql: PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX dbc: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Category:> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri dct:subject dbc:Tiger_reserves_of_India . ?uri text:"shares" . ?uri text:"north-eastern boundary" . ?uri text:"Nepal" . }

question.string: Who was the first deaf-blind person to receive a bachelor of arts degree?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Person . ?uri text:"first deaf-blind" . ?uri text:"receive" . ?uri text:"bachelor of arts degree" . }

question.string: Who was the first man to walk on the moon?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Person . ?uri text:"first man" . ?uri text:"walk" . ?uri text:"moon" . }

question.string: How many floors does the tower on the Champ de Mars in Paris have?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Building . ?uri dbo:floorCount ?proj . ?uri text:"tower" . ?uri text:"Champ de Mars" . ?uri text:"Paris" .}

question.string: The net worth of which actor is estimated by Forbes magazine to be $350 million?

query.sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Actor . ?uri text:"net worth" . ?uri text:"estimated" . ?uri text:"$350 million" . ?uri text:"Forbes magazine" . }
